Post.title: ES6  (  )
Post._content:
# 

## 

### 

```js
let [a, b, c] = [1, 2, 3];
console.log(a); // 1
console.log(b); // 2
console.log(c); // 3
```

### 

```js
let [a, b, c] = [1, 2];
console.log(a); // 1
console.log(b); // 2
console.log(c); //undefined
```

### 

```js
let [a, [b, [c, [d, [e, [f]]]]]] = [1, [2, [3, [4, [5, [6]]]]]];
console.log(a); // 1
console.log(b); // 2
console.log(c); // 3
console.log(d); // 4
console.log(e); // 5
console.log(f); // 6
```

### 

```js
let [a, b = 3] = [1];
console.log(a); // 1
console.log(b); // 3
```

## 

### 

```js
let { a, b, c } = { a: 1, c: 2, b: 3 };
console.log(a); // 1
console.log(b); // 3
console.log(c); // 2
```

### 

```js
let { a } = { b: 1 };
console.log(a); // undefined
```

### 

```js
let {
  a: {
    b: { c },
  },
} = { a: { b: { c: 1 } } };
console.log(c);
console.log(a); // a  b 
console.log(b); // 1
```

### 

```js
let { a, b = 1 } = { a: 1 };
console.log(a); // 1
console.log(b); // 1
```

## 

### 

```js
let [a, b, c, d, e, f] = "pretty";
console.log(a); // p
console.log(b); // r
console.log(c); // e
console.log(d); // t
console.log(e); // t
console.log(f); // y
```

# 

## 

```js
let a = 1;
let b = 3;
[a, b] = [b, a];
console.log(a); // 3
console.log(b); // 1
```

## 

```js
function demo() {
  return { name: "", age: 12 };
}
let { name, age } = demo();
console.log(name); // 
console.log(age); // 12
```

## 

```js
function demo1({ a, b, c }) {
  console.log(a); // 
  console.log(b); // 22
  console.log(c); // 175
}
demo1({ a: "", b: 22, c: 175 });
```

## 

```js
function fn1({ name = "" }) {
  console.log(name);
}
fn1({ name: "" }); // 
fn1({}); // 
```

# ES6 

## 

**`${}`**

```js
let Person = {
  name: "",
  age: 22,
  sex: "",
  hobby: "",
};
let str = `${Person.name},${Person.age},${Person.sex},${Person.hobby}`;
console.log(str); // ,22,,
```

## repeat( )

`repeat()`  :  `N`  ,  , 

```js
let str1 = "";
let str2 = str1.repeat(2);
console.log(str2); // 
```

## includes( )

`includes()`  :  ,  `true` , `false`  ,  ( `0` )

```js
let str = "codehhr";
console.log(str.includes("c")); // true
console.log(str.includes("code")); // true
console.log(str.includes("h", 5)); // true
console.log(str.includes("h", 6)); // false
```

## startsWith( )

 ,  ( `0` )

```js
let str = "codehhr";
console.log(str.startsWith("c")); // true
console.log(str.startsWith("code")); // true
console.log(str.startsWith("c", 0)); // true
console.log(str.startsWith("c", 1)); // false
```

## endsWith( )

 ,  , 

```js
let str = "codehhr";
console.log(str.endsWith("r")); // true
console.log(str.endsWith("hr")); // true
console.log(str.endsWith("hr", 6)); // false
console.log(str.endsWith("hr", 7)); // true
```

## String.raw



```js
// 
console.log(String.raw`hello\nworld`); // hello\nworld
```

# ES6 

## Array.of( )

 , 

```js
let newArr = Array.of(1, 2, 3, 4, 5);
console.log(newArr); // [1,2,3,4,5]

kali  swaks 

```bash
swaks --to xxx@qq.com
```

 QQ 

```bash
root@kali:~
 swaks --to 1871973389@qq.com                                          01:59:06
=== Trying mx3.qq.com:25...

<-  250 OK.

 -> DATA

 -> Date: Sat, 07 Dec 2019 01:59:07 -0500
 -> To: 1871973389@qq.com
 -> From: root@kali.lan
 -> Subject: test Sat, 07 Dec 2019 01:59:07 -0500
 -> Message-Id: <20191207015907.007285@kali.lan>

 smtp

```bash
swaks --to  --from  --body  --header "Subject:hello" --server smtp.qq.com -p 25 -au  -ap SMTP
```



```bash
    --to //;
    --from //;
    --ehlo qq.com //ehlo;
    --body "https://goobe.io" //;
    --header "Subject:hello" //Subject;
    --data email.txt //TXT;
    --help 
    --verison 

	:
    ===:swaks
    *:swaks
     ->:()
    <- :()
    <**:
```

## 4.

```bash
swaks --to  --from   --body   --header "Subject:hello" --attach example.doc --server smtp.qq.com -p 25 -au  -ap SMTP
```
